com.company

Class Collection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Collection

  • public class Collection
extends java.lang.Object
    The collection where Album objects are added into, methods here operate on the collection. Can find, add, remove, lendOut, and return Albums in the collection. Can grow and print the collection to the user based on their sorted preference.
    Author:
    Nicholas Triano, Antonio Ignarra

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Collection(Album[] albums, int numAlbums)
      Constructor for Collection class creates a new Collection object with given parameters

      Allows other classes to retrieve the number of albums

      Lends out an album and sets the album's availability to unavailable if eligible
      void print()
      Display the list without specifying the order
      void printByGenre()
      Sorts and displays the array of albums sorted by genres
      void printByReleaseDate()
      Sorts and displays the array of albums in order of release dates

      • Collection

        public Collection(Album[] albums,
                  int numAlbums)
        Constructor for Collection class creates a new Collection object with given parameters
        Parameters:
        albums - An array of the albums currently in the collection
        numAlbums - The number of albums in the collection

    • Method Detail

      • getNumAlbums

        public int getNumAlbums()
        Allows other classes to retrieve the number of albums
        Returns:
        the number of albums currently in the collection

      • add

        public boolean add(Album album)
        Adds an album to the collection
        Parameters:
        album - The album to be added to the collection
        Returns:
        false if the collection already contains the given album, true if the album was successfully added

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Album album)
        Removes an album from the collection
        Parameters:
        album - the album to be removed from the collection
        Returns:
        false if the album is not in the collection, true if the album is successfully removed

      • lendingOut

        public boolean lendingOut(Album album)
        Lends out an album and sets the album's availability to unavailable if eligible
        Parameters:
        album - the album to lend out
        Returns:
        true if album is successfully lent out, false otherwise

      • returnAlbum

        public boolean returnAlbum(Album album)
        Returns an album and sets the album's availability to available if eligible
        Parameters:
        album - the album being returned
        Returns:
        true if album is successfully returned, false otherwise

        public void print()
        Display the list without specifying the order

        Sorts and displays the array of albums sorted by genres
